scripts.create_multiple_ALT: ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/ALT/create_multiple_ALT.ts || (sleep 2 && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/ALT/create_multiple_ALT.ts) || (sleep 2 && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/ALT/create_multiple_ALT.ts) || (sleep 2 && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/ALT/create_multiple_ALT.ts) || (sleep 2 && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/ALT/create_multiple_ALT.ts)
scripts.init_scripts: ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/0_init_orca_strategy.ts && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/1_init_token_account.ts && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/2_init_invest_tracker.ts

ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/0_init_orca_strategy.ts && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/1_init_token_account.ts && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npx ts-node scripts/orca/2_init_invest_tracker.ts
scripts.buy_and_sell: ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run direct_deposit && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run update_invest_tracker && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run report_profit && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run free_funds_with_vault_redeem && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run update_invest_tracker && ANCHOR_PROVIDER_URL="https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com" ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/mainnet.json npm run report_profit
scripts.deploy-for-orca: anchor deploy --program-name tokenized_vault && anchor deploy --program-name access_control && anchor deploy --program-name strategy && anchor deploy --program-name accountant
scripts.wipe: npm run clean && rm -rf target/* && npm run build && npm run sync && npm run sync && npm run build
scripts.wipe-deploy: npm run clean && rm -rf target/* && npm run build && npm run sync && npm run sync && npm run build && npm run deploy-for-orca
